member.name: M:JetBrains.Rider.Test.Framework.Core.Settings.RiderTestSettingsManager.ResetSettings
member.summary: Re-mount Rider test settings layer with current layer priority

member.name: M:JetBrains.Rider.Test.Framework.Core.Settings.RiderTestSettingsManager.ResetSettingsLayer(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set Rider settings layer with a defined priority and reset settings accoriding to this priority.
member.param: Flag define the priority for a new settings layer. If false - override all settings layers and ignore them in test, if true - store user solution and below settings layers.

member.name: T:JetBrains.Rider.Test.Framework.UnitTests.RiderTestMessageBox
member.summary: Prevents marshalling msgboxes into IDEA in tests, replies with default choice.
